info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 8:47PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rabun, south central Macon and northwestern Oconee Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 847 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Clayton, or 4 miles southeast of Sky Valley, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clayton, Mountain City, Tiger, Dillard, Sky Valley, Lake Burton, Lakemont, Black Rock Mountain State Park, Tallulah Gorge State Park and Lake Rabun. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
